definition: pen/pencil/writing brush/to write or compose/the strokes of Chinese characters/classifier for sums of money, deals/CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]

sentences.english: Q. So beware the tapping of the pen.
sentences.chinese: 因此要留意那支钢笔的敲击。

sentences.english: I buy this pen from Huaxing Store.
sentences.chinese: 我从华兴商店买的这支钢笔。

sentences.english: How much did you spend on this new pen?
sentences.chinese: 买这支新钢笔你花了多少钱？

sentences.english: The words written by the pen smear easily.
sentences.chinese: 用钢笔写的字容易被擦模糊。

sentences.english: How much did you buy the pen for ?
There is a mark of ink on his shirt !
sentences.chinese: 在他的衬衫上有一块钢笔水的污渍。

sentences.english: You are to use ink, make no erasures.
sentences.chinese: 务必使用钢笔，而且不能涂改。

sentences.english: The red pen is the longest of the three.
sentences.chinese: 红色的钢笔是三支中最长的。

sentences.english: Pen and brown -ink wash on vellum paper folded twice. 8x7 in.
sentences.chinese: 钢笔，棕色墨水，折叠两次的羊皮纸。

sentences.english: A penholder and its pen point.
sentences.chinese: 笔尖或有固定种类的钢笔尖。

sentences.english: Please lend me a pen to write with.
My pen turned up in a drawer.
sentences.chinese: 我的钢笔在一个抽屉里找到了。

sentences.english: I looked at the pen and ink drawings.
sentences.chinese: 我看了看那些用钢笔画的素描。

sentences.english: With one penny Ihad this peculiar pen opened.
sentences.chinese: 我花了一便士让人把这支奇特的钢笔翻开了。

sentences.english: We will equip Jordan, meanwhile, Jordan with a keyboard or an old-school pen.
sentences.chinese: 同时，用一个键盘，或守旧派钢笔来装备。

sentences.english: He dipped his pen in ink.

definition: felt-tip pen/roller ball pen/gel ink pen
ballpoint pen/also written 圓珠筆|圆珠笔
the shaft of a pen or writing brush/pen-holder/pen
the cap of a pen, pencil or writing brush/the sheath of a pen (made of cloth, silk or thread)
ability to write/writing skill/written/in written form
book/notebook/Japanese-style self-published comic (esp. an erotic one), aka "dōjinshi"/CL:本[ben3]/edition
the cap of a pen, pencil, or writing brush
